text: Hydrobasileus is a small genus of dragonflies in the family Libellulidae, found in Southeast Asia, Indonesia, New Guinea, the Solomon Islands and Australia. ==Species== The genus Hydrobasileus includes the following three species: *Hydrobasileus brevistylus *Hydrobasileus croceus *Hydrobasileus vittatus ==See also== * List of Odonata species of Australia ==References== Category:Libellulidae Category:Anisoptera genera Category:Odonata of Oceania Category:Odonata of Asia Category:Odonata of Australia Category:Taxa named by William Forsell Kirby Category:Insects described in 1889 Category:Lists of insects
title: Hydrobasileus
